price: 42. (Falo) alobi: Iyo, ya soló, nakotiya bino pembeni na ngai.
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
